name: The Hank Hanky Christmas Special: The Game
name_original: The Hank Hanky Christmas Special: The Game
description:
based on the Hank Hanky christmas special, Hank must stop the evil raindeer to save Santa from being cooked. Want spoilers from the movie? Find out in this game!

“A Hank Hanky Christmas Special” is coming soon to FiyahTV in 2023.
